entries.title: Astronauts who first flew SpaceX capsule to be honored at White House
entries.description: The last time the medal was awarded was in 2006 to Robert Crippen, the pilot of the first Space Shuttle flight.

entries.title: These robots might build your house
entries.description: The construction industry is in a crisis, and more companies are turning to robots to automate tasks on the job site.

entries.title: Your iPhone has powerful new security features. Do you need them?
entries.description: Apple has added support for physical security keys and expanded encryption to the new iPhone iOS 16.3 update, but they’re not for everyone.
